translations-description: Translations of applications and programs into the Czech language from English
bitwarden-subheading: Password manager, available on the vast majority of devices
bitwarden-description: I have been translating the project continuously since June 2019. During that time, I participated in the translation of 350+ strings together with other translators.
bouncer-subheading: Application for managing or deleting permissions on Android
bouncer-description: The application is translated in its entirety, some translations have not yet been updated by the developer in the application.
sharex-subheading: The best screenshot program for Windows
sharex-description: I have been translating the project continuously since July 2021. I also contribute code to the project.
